list.name: service_up
list.description: Couchbase service healthcheck

list.name: ram_total_bytes
list.description: Total memory available to the node

list.name: ram_usage_bytes
list.description: Memory used by the node

list.name: ram_used_by_data_bytes
list.description: Memory used by data in the node

list.name: ram_quota_total_bytes
list.description: Memory quota allocated to the node

list.name: ram_quota_used_bytes
list.description: Memory quota used by the node

list.name: disk_total_bytes
list.description: Total disk space available to the node

list.name: disk_quota_total_bytes
list.description: Disk space quota for the node

list.name: disk_used_by_data_bytes
list.description: Disk space used by the data in the node

list.name: disk_used_bytes
list.description: Disk space used by the node

list.name: disk_quota_used_bytes
list.description: Disk space quota used by the node

list.name: disk_free_bytes
list.description: Free disk space in the node

list.name: cpu_utilization_rate
list.description: CPU utilization rate in percent

list.name: swap_total_bytes
list.description: Total swap space allocated to the node

list.name: swap_used_bytes
list.description: Amount of swap space used by the node

list.name: stats_cmd_get
list.description: Number of get commands

list.name: stats_couch_docs_actual_disk_size
list.description: Disk space used by Couchbase documents

list.name: stats_couch_docs_data_size
list.description: Couchbase documents data size in the node

list.name: stats_couch_spatial_data_size
list.description: Data size for Couchbase spatial views

list.name: stats_couch_spatial_disk_size
list.description: Disk space used by Couchbase spatial views

list.name: stats_couch_views_actual_disk_size
list.description: Disk space used by Couchbase views

list.name: stats_couch_views_data_size
list.description: Data size for Couchbase views

list.name: stats_curr_items
list.description: Number of current items

list.name: stats_curr_items_tot
list.description: Total number of items in the node

list.name: stats_ep_bg_fetched
list.description: Number of background disk fetches

list.name: stats_get_hits
list.description: Number of get hits

list.name: stats_mem_used
list.description: Memory used by the node

list.name: stats_ops
list.description: Number of operations performed in the node

list.name: stats_vb_replica_curr_items
list.description: Number of replicas in current items

list.name: uptime_seconds
list.description: Node uptime

list.name: cluster_membership
list.description: Status of node cluster membership. 1:active, 2:inactiveAdded, 3:inactiveFailed

list.name: status
list.description: Status of couchbase node. 1:healthy, 2:warmup

list.name: fts_ram_quota_bytes
list.description: Memory quota allocated to full text search buckets

list.name: index_ram_quota_bytes
list.description: Memory quota allocated to index buckets

list.name: data_ram_quota_bytes
list.description: Memory quota allocated to data buckets

list.name: stats_vb_active_num_non_resident_number
list.description: Number of non-resident items in active vbuckets
